messages.subject: LEARNapalooza: A Homeschool Experience
messages.msgSnippet: LEARNapalooza: A Homeschool Experience Education based homeschooling workshops for new & veteran homeschoolers, unschoolers, teens, & children... Memorial Day
messages.messageBody:
LEARNapalooza: A Homeschool Experience
Education based homeschooling workshops for new & veteran homeschoolers,
unschoolers, teens, & children...


Memorial Day Weekend
May 28, 29 & 30th 2004
Hyatt Regency Hotel - Crown Center
Kansas City, MO

Key Note Speakers


John Taylor Gatto


Linda Dobson


Featured Speakers


David Albert


Discounted rates for early registration (watch website for rate announcements) www.kclearn.org
Discounted hotel rates for conference participants
Discounted conference rates for vendors

Nearby attractions within walking distance include: Kaleidoscope - a creative workshop for children through Hallmark, Union Station and Science City, Crown Center Shopping & movie theaters, Liberty Memorial, downtown KC, local parks, easy access Public Transportation to the Plaza area and Westport.


Information will be added to the website as plans are finalized. We are very excited to have our dream become reality. Please help us make this the best conference we can by sharing this information with others who might benefit from attending.

:) I'm so excited about this. :) Jane







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
